name: Shromp
description:
This is a game about a mushroom who goes through lots of hard mind puzzling missions all because someone stole his favorite hat. There are many different levels and problems to overcome which makes you die a lot. Some of the levels are quite simple, yet some are harder than others. 

CONTROLS:

Use "A" and "D" and "SPACE" for simple movement. Also if you wish to go back to the main menu and lose all your progress then hit "R".

CREDITS:

Everything made by me. I used BeepBox for the music and Bfxr to make the sounds in the game.

This game also features a full tutorial and up to 10 different levels! Each (hopefully) getting harder as you go.
